title: Uchi no Shitsuji ga Iukoto ni wa
original_name: うちの執事が言うことには
sinopse:
Kaei Karasuma is the head of the Karasuma family and since his father and the butler that was taking care of him vanished without saying anything is his responsibility to deal with the new butler and the problems that come along with his arrival.

(Source: MU)
